Subtitles: EN, DE, NL, HI, TR, EN HI
Date: 2010.12

Director:
Phillip Noyce

Genres:
Action | Crime | Mystery | Thriller

Plot:
Evelyn Salt is a CIA agent and highly respected by all, including her boss, Ted Winter.
Out of the blue, a Russian spy walks into their offices and offers a vital piece of information:
the President of Russia will be assassinated during his forthcoming visit to New York City to
attend the funeral of the recently deceased U.S. Vice President. The name of the assassin:
Evelyn Salt. Concerned about the safety of her husband, who she cannot contact, she goes on
the run. Winter refuses to accept that she is a mole or a double agent but her actions begin
to raise doubts. Just who is Evelyn Salt and what is she planning?

Release notes:
The VAMPS rls was nuked for having watermaked audio. (WTF?!)

Besides that, we thought it was pretty weird when your vobsample was having English, Spanish
and Portuguese language menus, you did not include those subtitles with your release? Why's that?
Oh right, because they weren't on your source! The best you came up with were English SDH subs only,
which were taken from a bluray source. Just try to rip them with subrip or something, and you'll be
having a hard time. That's because those subtitles were scaled down from a high res bluray to NTSC
resolution. Our English SDH subs seem to be of greater quality too.

You'll notice our vobsample will have a fucked up playback. That's because the 3 PGC of the movie cuts
are overlapping/playing instantly after eachother.

Seeing VAMPS' release history, we're doubting how "retail" their Wall Street 2 release is.

Enjoy a PROPER RETAiL release from EXviD. We'll be doing the EXTENDED version too, which has some
more interesting scenes towards the end not included in the theatrical/DC.

This movie was exactly 13 seconds short of making it a 2CD release, but we decided to do both cuts
on one CD because it compressed rather well.

Enjoy!
